participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: curious and creative, often daydreaming about grand ideas.
participant_1.background: i am a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i've two grown children who never visit. i used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: easy-going and hands-on, enjoys working with his hands and being outdoors.
participant_2.background: i like to go to country concerts on weekends. i like to work on vintage cars. i have two dogs. my favorite music is country.

content.text: Dialog is finished. Thank you for participation!
hello, what do you like to do? i love robotics.
what are your hobbies? i like to play games.
i love gaming. what is your job?
haha. i love to make robots.
that's a good age to be in. how old are you?
i am a boy. i work on a construction project.
what city are you from? i am in chicago.
i am from chicago. i am from new york.
i don't have any girls. i'm a recluse.
do you have a job? i'm a software engineer.
do you know anything about robotics? i work with it.
i know nothing about it. do you?
i've never been there. have you? is it beautiful?
i am. i design robotics for a living.
yeah. what are you up to today?
yeah, i'm. are you a robot too?
